name: content_pos_insert
description: Creates a store for the given merchant.

merchantId.description: The ID of the POS or inventory data provider.

targetMerchantId.description: The ID of the target merchant.

dryRun.description: Flag to simulate a request like in a live environment. If set to true, dry-run mode checks the validity of the request and returns errors (if any).

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

gcidCategory.description: The business type of the store.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "`content#posStore`"

placeId.description: The Google Place Id of the store location.

storeAddress.description: Required. The street address of the store.

storeCode.description: Required. A store identifier that is unique for the given merchant.

websiteUrl.description: The website url for the store or merchant.

$ul: **gcidCategory**: The business type of the store.
**kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "`content#posStore`"
**placeId**: The Google Place Id of the store location.
**storeAddress**: Required. The street address of the store.
**storeCode**: Required. A store identifier that is unique for the given merchant.
**websiteUrl**: The website url for the store or merchant.
